sentence: Since its Friday, we always like to send you into the week with a little light reading, including: Jamie DuPrees Washington Insider column Thursday, Georgia at the tip of the spear?; Fridays Political Insider column, A legislative session for Brian Kemp to take to the bank.? As always, Jolt readers are some of our favorite tipsters.
author: Tia Mitchell
title: The Jolt: See Sonny Perdues resume for his new $524,000 job as chancellor
